author: Nova_Hunter
title: Good promotional set.
review: This is actually a very nice promotional set, and my favorite of this line of McDonald's promotional sets. The helicopter is nicely designed and it was a neat little thing to get in my Happy Meal as a young kid. I wish LEGO still had good McDonald's promotional items like this, nowadays when LEGO does such a promotion, it's usually not a very LEGO-like toy.
